titleStmt.title: Rome's overthrow in a fatal blow at her greatest idol, which leaves all inexusable who resolve still to be blind after such plain conviction a discourse very seasonable for these times wherein popery doth daily threaten in the nation / by a son of the Church.
titleStmt.author: Son of the Church.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
